sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_gd_guidance.GuidedDecisionComponentUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>GuidedDecisionComponentUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var GuidedDecisionComponentUtil = Class.create();
GuidedDecisionComponentUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	// sys_ux_screen_type Recommendation card base
	SCREEN_COLLECTION_BASE: '99db11a1b7e21110ca990f68ee11a985',
	getPreviewExperienceRefQual: function () {
		var macroponents = [];
		var grScreens = new GlideRecord('sys_ux_screen');
		grScreens.addEncodedQuery('screen_type=99db11a1b7e21110ca990f68ee11a985');
		grScreens.query();
		while(grScreens.next()) {
			macroponents.push(grScreens.getValue('macroponent'));
		}
		return 'sys_idIN' + macroponents.join(',');
	},
    type: 'GuidedDecisionComponentUtil'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-10-17 16:27:21</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2e49bbd653221110ca99ddeeff7b1224</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>GuidedDecisionComponentUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Guided Decisions - Guidance" source="sn_gd_guidance">fd76ed5a3b570010119c870044efc470</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Guided Decisions - Guidance">fd76ed5a3b570010119c870044efc470</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2e49bbd653221110ca99ddeeff7b1224</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-10-17 16:33:21</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
